recipe.title: Horseradish Dunk
ingredients: 3/4 cup/105 g peeled, cored, and minced Granny Smith apple
1/4 cup/12 g finely snipped fresh chives
Roasted Fingerling Potatoes, baked potato chips, wedges of tart apples, rolled slices of rare roast beef
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the sour cream, apple, horseradish, onion, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Using a rubber spatula, fold in the chives. Refrigerate at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld and the dip to thicken.
